resources.string: Hello, my name is Bryce,"\n"I have been working with Android Development for almost a year now. I have been programming in C++ for 4 years. I am mostly self-taught, I currently have an Associate\'s Degree. I have taken courses on Udemy and Udacity. I am currently working on my Bachelor\'s Degree and I am also finishing a Nano-Degree from Udacity. Once I have finished my Nano-Degree I will also be taking the Associate Android Developer Certification from Google. My goal is to become the best programmer I can by learning everything I can.

○ Java"
"○ C++"
"○ Android"
"○ Unreal Engine"
○ VR Development - Oculus Rift
